name: markdown-publisher
description: Laju (Indonesian for 'fast/swift') is a high-performance TypeScript web framework combining HyperExpress, Svelte 5, and Inertia.js for building modern full-stack applications. Features server-side rendering, real-time capabilities, and seamless client-server state management.

scripts.dev: clear && rm -rf dist && rm -rf build && npx concurrently 'vite'  'sleep 1 && npx nodemon --legacy-watch'
scripts.build: rm -rf dist build && mkdir -p dist/views && cp -rf resources/views/* dist/views && vite build && tsc && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json && cp -rf dist build && cp -rf public build && cp -rf resources/views/partials build/dist/views

author: Maulana Shalihin
